entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
